languages.text: "Прежде я не бывал в свите Вольного Торговца. В остальном..." {n}Соломон окидывает мостик взглядом.{/n} "Я приспосабливаюсь быстрее, чем вы думаете. И пока Глейто со мной, я готов к любым перестановкам".

"I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."
languages.original_text: "Прежде я не бывал в свите Вольного Торговца. В остальном..." {n}Соломон окидывает мостик взглядом.{/n} "Я приспосабливаюсь быстрее, чем вы думаете. И пока Глейто со мной, я готов к любым перестановкам".

traits.locale_text: "I have never been part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. Aside from that..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

"I have never been part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. Aside from that..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

"I have never been part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. Aside from that..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

"I have never been part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. Aside from that..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

"I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

"I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの護衛任務に就くのは初めてです。とはいえ…」{n}ソロモーンはブリッジを見回した。{/n}「私は見た目以上に、変化への順応は早い方です。グライトさえそばにいれば、どんな環境の変化にも対応できます」
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの護衛任務に就くのは初めてです。とはいえ…」{n}ソロモーンはブリッジを見回した。{/n}「私は見た目以上に、変化への順応は早い方です。グライトさえそばにいれば、どんな環境の変化にも対応できます」

languages.text: "Ich war noch nie Teil der Eskorte {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Dennoch ..." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Blick über die Brücke schweifen.{/n} "Ich passe mich Veränderungen schneller an, als Ihr vielleicht denkt. Und solange Glaito bei mir ist, werde ich mit jedem Wechsel fertig."
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch nie Teil der Eskorte {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Dennoch ..." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Blick über die Brücke schweifen.{/n} "Ich passe mich Veränderungen schneller an, als Ihr vielleicht denkt. Und solange Glaito bei mir ist, werde ich mit jedem Wechsel fertig."

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais fait partie de l'escorte d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Cependant... {n}Solomorne embrasse le pont du regard.{/n} Je dispose d'assez bonnes capacités d'adaptation. Tant que Glaito est avec moi, je suis capable de supporter n'importe quel ajustement. »
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais fait partie de l'escorte d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Cependant... {n}Solomorne embrasse le pont du regard.{/n} Je dispose d'assez bonnes capacités d'adaptation. Tant que Glaito est avec moi, je suis capable de supporter n'importe quel ajustement. »

languages.text: «Nunca antes había formado parte del séquito de un Comerciante Independiente. Por otro lado...». {n}Solomorne recorre el puente con la mirada.{/n} «Me adapto más deprisa de lo que pueda imaginar. Y mientras Glaito esté a mi lado, puedo con cualquier cambio».
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca antes había formado parte del séquito de un Comerciante Independiente. Por otro lado...». {n}Solomorne recorre el puente con la mirada.{/n} «Me adapto más deprisa de lo que pueda imaginar. Y mientras Glaito esté a mi lado, puedo con cualquier cambio».

languages.text: “我确实从来没当过行商浪人的随行人员，话虽如此……”{n}索罗蒙环顾了一下舰桥四周。{/n}“我适应的速度比你想象得更快。只要有格雷托陪着我，我就能适应一切变化。”
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: “我确实从来没当过行商浪人的随行人员，话虽如此……”{n}索罗蒙环顾了一下舰桥四周。{/n}“我适应的速度比你想象得更快。只要有格雷托陪着我，我就能适应一切变化。”

languages.text: "Daha önce bir Hür Tacir'e refakat etmemiştim. Bununla birlikte..." {n}Solomorne köprüye göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Düşündüğünden daha çabuk değişime uyum sağlarım. Ayrıca Glaito yanımda olduğu sürece her türlü değişiklikle başa çıkabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I have never been a part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."

traits.locale_text: "Daha önce hiç bir Hür Tacir'in refakatçisi olmadım. Bununla birlikte..." {n}Solomorne köprüye göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Düşündüğünden daha çabuk değişime uyum sağlarım. Ayrıca, Glaito yanımda olduğu sürece her dönüşümle başa çıkabilirim."

languages.original_text: "I have never been part of a Rogue Trader's escort before. That said..." {n}Solomorne glances around the bridge.{/n} "I adapt to change more quickly than you might think. And as long as Glaito is with me, I can handle any transition."
